creditline: The Linda and Lawrence Perlman Photography Endowment and the Walter McCarthy and Clara Ueland Endowment for Photographs
description: a pair of hand writing on a notepad; L hand rest on a black and white speckled composition notebook while R hand hold pencil that is labelled "Board of Education-City of New York"; the sentence "There are no mosquitos at this time of year." is repeated down notepad, which is on top of another book
inscription: LL in pencil: From \"Re-Visions\" | verso, UL in pencil: #5 | verso, BC in pencil: MRRV05.2 | verso, BC in pencil: 7535
signed: below image in pencil: In class, one day, she was bitten by a mosquito and became unruly. Her teacher made her stay late after school. | LR in pencil: Marcia Resnick | verso, LR in pencil: Marcia Resnick
title: In class, one day, she was bitten by a mosquito. Her teacher made her stay later after school and became unruly
